chef.name: Moushumi Hamid
chef.bio: Moushumi Hamid is a well-known TV host and actress in Bangladesh. She is passionate about cooking and often shares her recipes with her fans.

ingredients: 1 large Hilsa fish, cleaned and cut into pieces
instructions: Mix turmeric powder, red chilli powder and salt in a bowl and marinate the fish pieces with the mixture for 10 minutes.
Heat mustard oil in a pan and fry the fish pieces till golden brown. Keep aside.
In the same pan, add chopped onion and green chillies and sauté till the onion turns translucent.
Add mustard paste, sugar and salt to taste. Stir well.
Add a cup of water and let it boil.
Add the fried fish pieces to the gravy and cook for 5-7 minutes.
